summary.span: 承载 HTML 文档并在其之间导航。

span.span: Hosts and navigates between HTML documents.

summary.span: 启用 WPF 托管代码和 HTML 脚本之间的互操作性。

span.span: Enables interoperability between WPF managed code and HTML script.

related.span: XBAP 承载 Silverlight 示例

span.span: XBAP Hosting Silverlight Sample

summary.span: 要导航到的文档完成下载时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the document being navigated to has finished downloading.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 导航的事件处理程序传递的实例类，该类提供上下文信息的导航，包括 Web 响应的详细信息。Navigated event handlers are passed an instance of the class, which provides contextual information about the navigation, including Web response details. 仅将对顶级导航触发此事件。This event will only be fired for top-level navigations.

summary.span: 获取或设置公共类的一个实例，该实例由主机应用程序实现且可由寄宿文档的脚本访问。

span.span: Gets or sets an instance of a public class, implemented by the host application, that can be accessed by script from a hosted document.

value.span: 作为 类的实例的 ，由主机应用程序实现且可由寄宿文档的脚本访问。

span.span: The that is an instance of a class, implemented by the host application, that can be accessed by script from a hosted document.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性可以设置为任何 COM 可见的对象为其所需其公共属性和方法可用于脚本代码。This property can be set to any COM-visible object for which you want its public properties and methods available to scripting code. 您可以通过将其与标记使 COM 可见类。You can make a class COM-visible by marking it with the . 设置脚本通过对当前文档是公开的对象[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_html](~/includes/tla2sharptla-html-md.md)]DOM 中使用`window.external`属性。The object that is set for scripting is exposed to the current document by the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_html](~/includes/tla2sharptla-html-md.md)] DOM using the `window.external` property.

exception.span: 是通过不属于 类型的实例设置的。

span.span: is set with an instance of type that is not .

summary.span: 重载带有可选缓存验证的当前页。

span.span: Reloads the current page with optional cache validation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`noCache`是`true`，则通过发送控制刷新而不进行缓存验证"Pragma:no-缓存"到服务器的标头。If `noCache` is `true`, the control refreshes without cache validation by sending a "Pragma:no-cache" header to the server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置源属性会导致导航到指定的文档。Setting the source property causes to navigate to the document specified by the . 如果是`null`，显示一个空白文档 ("有关： 空白")。If the is `null`, a blank document is displayed ("about:blank"). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何配置导航到[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_html](~/includes/tla2sharptla-html-md.md)]只使用标记的文档。The following example shows how to configure to navigate to an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_html](~/includes/tla2sharptla-html-md.md)] document by using markup only. ```xaml ```
